name: Lottery Death
phrase: An old man turned 98. He won the lottery and died the next day.

name: Chardonnay Fly
phrase: It's a black fly in your chardonnay.

name: Late Pardon
phrase: It's a death row pardon two minutes too late.

name: Wedding Rain
phrase: It's like rain on your wedding day.

name: Free Ride
phrase: It's a free ride when you've already paid.

name: Good Advice
phrase: It's the good advice that you just didn't take.

name: Plane Crash
phrase:
Mr. Play It Safe was afraid to fly.
He packed his suitcase and kissed his kids goodbye.
He waited his whole damn life to take that flight.
And as the plane crashed down, he thought
"Well, isn't this nice?"

name: Traffic Jam
phrase: A traffic jam when you're already late.

name: Smoking Sign
phrase: A no-smoking sign on your cigarette break.

name: 10,000 Spoons
phrase: It's like ten thousand spoons when all you need is a knife.

name: Dream Man
phrase: It's meeting the man of my dreams. And then meeting his beautiful wife.
